name: Clyde's World: Clyde The Artist
description:
Clyde The Artist is a mumblecore dialog based comedy game inspired by early 00's comedy such as Home Movies and Homestar Runner. Clyde is just your average awkward schoolkid in art school. An episode of Clyde's World, narrative/voice over proof of concept

Made for NYU Game Center's Prototype Studio Spring 2020

The prompt was: Rainbows
